text: Carl Edward Dobkins Jr. (January 13, 1941 â€“ April 8, 2020) was an American singer. He is best known for his rockabilly hit, "My Heart Is an Open Book", released in 1958. The single reached No. 3 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 in 1959. The record also won a gold disc as it sold over one million copies. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. Dobkins died on April 8, 2020, at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American country singers Category:American pop singers Category:American rock singers Category:Singers from Cincinnati
title: Carl Dobkins Jr.
